com.ibm.jaggr.service
Interface IShutdownListener

public interface IShutdownListener

Listener interface for shutdown notification. To receive shutdown notification, register the implementing class as an OSGi service, specifying the name of the aggregator under the name property in the service properties.

Method Summary
 void shutdown(IAggregator aggregator)
          This method is called from within the aggregator's HttpServlet#destroy() method to notify listeners that the servlet is shutting down.
 

Method Detail

shutdown

void shutdown(IAggregator aggregator)
This method is called from within the aggregator's HttpServlet#destroy() method to notify listeners that the servlet is shutting down.

Parameters:
aggregator - The aggregator that is shutting down
